name: Makeshift Hero
description:
An arcade style boss rush action game.

Gamepad Recommended - Controller Mapping Wrong? Make sure your input mapping is correct!

Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023.

Liked the game? Let me know! There's a couple of bosses I had to cut but really wanted to add.

CONTROLS

  • WASD/Left Joystick to Move
  • E/Circle to Charge/Interact
  • Q/L1 to Block/Use Shield
  • Space/Cross to Jump/Dash
  • J/R1 to Slash

TEAM

  • Art, Program, Gameplay - Secretmapper
  • Music - LeoWASD
